text:
Hello guys,
I am creating a blog listing page that's why, I want to know that can we edit theme blog listing page. because, I am unable to edit the theme blog listing  module.  either I have to clone or copy the blog listing page or there is other way for blog listing page.
please someone reply me,

We have 3 new free HubSpot themes I'd love for you all to install and try to break. Feedback appreciated!

<https://app.HubSpot.com/portal-recommend/l?slug=ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/consultary-lite-theme-by-remotish|Consultary Lite>
<https://app.HubSpot.com/portal-recommend/l?slug=ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/stockie-theme-by-remotish|Stockie>
<https://app.HubSpot.com/portal-recommend/l?slug=ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/tourizon-theme-by-remotish|Tourizon>
The common HubSpot video module have advance options which allows to autoplay the video but Custom module where I have created video field, does not have advance option to autoplay.
